name: Wabi Sabi
description:
Wabi-sabi is the beauty of things imperfect, impermanent, and incomplete, the polar opposite of our Western idea of beauty as something perfect, enduring, and monumental. It’s a shift in perspective from one of perfection to one that just appreciates what is.
Accepting that life and things are impermanent allows us to appreciate the beauty and melancholy of it. Life, with all its scars, wrinkles, and laugh lines, is itself perfectly imperfect and we should embrace the beauty in that.
